title: Le soulier de satin
actors: Luís Miguel Cintra, Patricia Barzyk, Anne Consigny, Anne Gautier, Bernard Alane, Jean-Pierre Bernard, Marie-Christine Barrault, Isabelle Weingarten, Henri Serre, Jean-Yves Berteloot, Catherine Jarret, Anny Romand, Bérangère Jean, Franck Oger, Jean Badin
description: During the century of the Spanish Gold, Doña Prouhèze, wife of a nobleman, deeply loves Don Rodrigo, who is forced to leave Spain and go to America. Meanwhile Prouhèze is sent to Africa to ...
